components/category/sidebar: {{> components/sbthemes/module/sb_extraslider/default products=products.top_sellers moduleId=3 row=4 columns=1 banner="no" class_sfx="sidebar--bestsell" }}
components/products/price-range:
{{#and price_range.min.with_tax price_range.max.with_tax}}
{{price_range.min.with_tax.formatted}} - {{price_range.max.with_tax.formatted}} {{#and price_range.min.without_tax price_range.max.without_tax}} {{lang 'products.price_with_tax' tax_label=price_range.min.tax_label}} {{else if schema_org}}
{{/and}}
{{/and}} {{#and price_range.min.without_tax price_range.max.without_tax}}
{{price_range.min.without_tax.formatted}} - {{price_range.max.without_tax.formatted}} {{#and price_range.min.with_tax price_range.max.with_tax}} {{lang 'products.price_without_tax' tax_label=price_range.min.tax_label}} {{/and}} {{#if schema_org}}
{{/if}}
{{/and}}
components/sbthemes/module/sb_extraslide:
{{#forEach (limit products theme_settings.homepage_extraslider_count)}} {{#if isFirst}}
{{/if}} {{#or (if index '===' (add 1 ../row)) (if index '===' (add 1 (multiply 2 ../row))) (if index '===' (add 1 (multiply 3 ../row))) }}
{{/or}} {{> components/sbthemes/products/card_row theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer}} {{#or (if index '===' ../row)(if index '==='(multiply 2 ../row)) (if index '==='(multiply 3 ../row) (if index '===' total))}}
{{/or}} {{/forEach}}
components/sbthemes/products/card_row:
{{name}}

{{#if theme_settings.show_product_brand}}

{{brand.name}}

{{/if}} {{#if theme_settings.show_product_rating}}
{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating}}
{{/if}} {{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price customer=customer}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
